ch.uzh.agglorecommender.recommender

Class Recommender

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.agglorecommender.recommender.Recommender

  • public final class Recommender
extends java.lang.Object
    Instantiates a new Recommender, which offers the possibility to recommend nodes and different helper methods supporting the recommendation

    • Field Summary

      private Searcher searcher

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Recommender(Searcher searcher)
      Needs to be instantiated with a reference to a searcher instance, which provides connections to the trees

        Parameters:
        position - starting point to calculate recommendation
        known - list of dataset items the user has already rated
